source.interface:
<implements name="GroupAdditive" />
* This interface represents an algebraic structure with two binary operations * addition and multiplication (+ and ·), such that (R, +) is an abelian group, * (R, ·) is a monoid and the multiplication distributes over the addition. Jean-Marie Dautelle 3.0, February 13, 2006
* Wikipedia: Mathematical Ring
* Returns the product of this object with the one specified. that the object multiplier. this · that.
